data.name: TableBorderDistances
desc: contains the distance settings of the border lines of all cells in a cell range.
In a queried structure, the flags in TableBorderDistances.Is...DistanceValid indicate that not all lines of the boxes have the same values.
In a structure which is used for setting, these flags determine if the corresponding distance should be set or if the old value should be kept.

properties.name: TopDistance
desc: contains the distance between the top lines and other contents.

properties.name: IsTopDistanceValid
desc: specifies whether the value of TableBorder.TopDistance is used.

properties.name: BottomDistance
desc: contains the distance between the bottom lines and other contents.

properties.name: IsBottomDistanceValid
desc: specifies whether the value of TableBorder.BottomDistance is used.

properties.name: LeftDistance
desc: contains the distance between the left lines and other contents.

properties.name: IsLeftDistanceValid
desc: specifies whether the value of TableBorder.LeftDistance is used.

properties.name: RightDistance
desc: contains the distance between the right lines and other contents.

properties.name: IsRightDistanceValid
desc: specifies whether the value of TableBorder.RightDistance is used.
